decisions.description: Element that checks if there are any Group Memberships to delete. Otherwise the flow will attempt to delete an empty variable.
decisions.name: Any_Group_Memberships_to_Delete
decisions.label: Any Group Memberships to Delete?

decisions.description: Element that checks if there are any Group Memberships to add.
decisions.name: Any_Groups_To_Assign
decisions.label: Any Groups To Assign

decisions.description: Element that checks the License of the User based on the Profile Id. We only want to assign Public Groups for users with a Salesforce license.
decisions.name: Check_License
decisions.label: Check License

decisions.description: Skip automation is a Custom Settings and allows for admin task to be executed without triggering automation
decisions.name: Skip_Automation
decisions.label: Skip Automation?

Flow.description: SubFlow to update the Public Groups assign to Lumon Internal Users
Flow.label: User - Assign Public Groups SubFlow R2.5.5

recordCreates.description: Element that creates new Group Memberships records.
recordCreates.name: Create_Group_Memberships
recordCreates.label: Create Group Memberships

recordDeletes.description: Element that deletes the redundant Group Memberships
recordDeletes.name: Delete_Group_Memberships
recordDeletes.label: Delete Group Memberships

recordLookups.description: Element that retrieves the Group records to be Assigned
recordLookups.name: Get_Groups_To_Assign
recordLookups.label: Get Groups To Assign

recordLookups.description: This element retrieves the Public Group referenced in the User Mapping Table
recordLookups.name: Get_Matched_Groups
recordLookups.label: Get Matched Groups

recordLookups.description: Element that retrieves the full User record
recordLookups.name: Get_User
recordLookups.label: Get User

recordLookups.description: Element that retrieves the Group Member records for this User to prevent unnecessary updates.
recordLookups.name: Get_User_Groups
recordLookups.label: Get User Groups

recordLookups.description: Element that retrieves the User Mapping Custom Metadata to be able to clear the Users Public Group Assignments
recordLookups.name: Get_User_Mapping_Custom_Metadata
